featured.text: In a panic (B) With delight (C) Out of sorrow (D) Filled with embarrassment 39. (A) they had seen my car (B) there was a shop nearby (C) they had seen two small girls (D) there was a police station in the neighborhood 40.

definition.zh_def: 鄰近的社區或地區，通常指一個城市或城鎮中的一個特定區域。
definition.en_def: A district or area that is near or around a particular place, often referring to a community within a city or town.
definition.example: I love walking in my neighborhood because there are many parks and friendly people.
